searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> Core:new() → any Creates a new OpenRT Core instance.

searchDocs.title: destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> Core:destroy() → nil Destroys an existing OpenRT Core instance and all attached metadata and instances.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> Material.new( name: string-- The name of the material ) → Material Creates a new Material instance.

searchDocs.title: destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> Material:destroy() → nil Destroys a Material instance and detaches it from the parent context.

searchDocs.title: setSize​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Material:setSize( size: Vector2 -- The new size to set ) → nil Sets the shared dimensions between all texture channels.

searchDocs.title: setTextureId​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Material:setTextureId( textureId: string,-- The texture ID to set channel: TextureChannel,-- The texture channel ("Albedo", "Normal", "Specular") subTextureIndex: number-- The index of the subtexture ) → nil Sets the texture map id of a subtexture in a texture channel.

searchDocs.title: getSize​
searchDocs.content: Getter </> Material:getSize() → Vector2  Sets the shared dimensions between all texture channels.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> Texture.new( name: string-- The name of the Texture ) → Texture Creates a new Texture instance.

searchDocs.title: destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> Texture:destroy() → nil Destroys the current Image and all associated metadata for the Texture

searchDocs.title: setParentContext​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Texture:setParentContext( Context:: MaterialsContext-- The context the Texture is stored in ) → nil Sets the MaterialsContext that the Texture is stored in.

searchDocs.title: setSize​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Texture:setSize( size:: Vector2 -- The new size of the texture ) → nil Sets the dimensions of the EditableImage attached to the Texture

searchDocs.title: setImageId​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Texture:setImageId( imageId: string-- The image id used to create the Image ) → nil Creates an EditableImage from an asset ID and assigns it to the Texture

searchDocs.title: setContent​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Texture:setContent( imageContent: Content-- The Image Content used to create the EditableImage used by the Texture ) → nil Creates a new EditableImage and assigns it to the Texture

searchDocs.title: compile​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Texture:compile() → buffer Compiles the Texture's Image pixel data into a buffer.u8 and assigns it to the Texture's PixelBuffer

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> MaterialsContext.new() → MaterialsContext Creates a new MaterialsContext instance.

searchDocs.title: destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> MaterialsContext:destroy() → nil Destroys an existing MaterialsContext instance and all associated metadata.

searchDocs.title: addMaterial​
searchDocs.content: Mutator </> MaterialsContext:addMaterial( MaterialInstance: Material-- The material instance to add ) → nil Creates a new Material instance and adds it to the MaterialsContext.

searchDocs.title: removeMaterial​
searchDocs.content: Mutator </> MaterialsContext:removeMaterial( identifier:: (string | Material)-- The name of the material to remove. This will not delete the material instance. ) → nil Removes an existing Material instance from the MaterialsContext instance.
